languages.text: "Будьте вы прокляты, {name}! Ненавижу, ненавижу!" {n}Страх и ярость, исходящие от Кассии, обжигают легкие. Колени подкашиваются, слезы душат, и в голове полный беспорядок. Вам тошно, но вдруг... наступает внезапное облегчение.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Будьте вы прокляты, {name}! Ненавижу, ненавижу!" {n}Страх и ярость, исходящие от Кассии, обжигают легкие. Колени подкашиваются, слезы душат, и в голове полный беспорядок. Вам тошно, но вдруг... наступает внезапное облегчение.{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Damn you, {name}! I hate you, I hate you!" {n}Cassia's fear and rage burn your lungs. Your knees buckle, tears swell in your throat, and your head is in utter disarray. You feel nauseous, but then... the sensations suddenly ease.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Будьте вы прокляты, {name}! Ненавижу, ненавижу!" {n}Страх и ярость, исходящие от Кассии, обжигают легкие. Колени подкашиваются, слезы душат, и в голове полный беспорядок. Вам тошно, но вдруг... наступает внезапное облегчение.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Damn you, {name}! I hate you, I hate you!" {n}Cassia's fear and rage burn your lungs. Your knees buckle, tears swell in your throat, and your head is in utter disarray. You feel nauseous, but then... the sensations suddenly ease.{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「ふざけるな、{name}！大嫌い、大嫌いよ！」{n}カシアの恐怖と激昂があなたの肺を焼く。ひざは崩れ、喉で悲しみが膨れ上がる。頭はすっかり混濁している。吐き気を感じたが、それからは…突然、穏やかな気持ちになる。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Damn you, {name}! I hate you, I hate you!" {n}Cassia's fear and rage burn your lungs. Your knees buckle, tears swell in your throat, and your head is in utter disarray. You feel nauseous, but then... the sensations suddenly ease.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「ふざけるな、{name}！大嫌い、大嫌いよ！」{n}カシアの恐怖と激昂があなたの肺を焼く。ひざは崩れ、喉で悲しみが膨れ上がる。頭はすっかり混濁している。吐き気を感じたが、それからは…突然、穏やかな気持ちになる。{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “你去死吧，{name}！我恨你，我恨死你了！”{n}卡西娅心中的恐惧与愤怒灼烧着你的肺部。你跪在地上，泪水在你的喉咙里打转，脑子里一片混乱。你感到胃里一阵恶心，但随后……这些感觉突然消失了。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Damn you, {name}! I hate you, I hate you!" {n}Cassia's fear and rage burn your lungs. Your knees buckle, tears swell in your throat, and your head is in utter disarray. You feel nauseous, but then... the sensations suddenly ease.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “你去死吧，{name}！我恨你，我恨死你了！”{n}卡西娅心中的恐惧与愤怒灼烧着你的肺部。你跪在地上，泪水在你的喉咙里打转，脑子里一片混乱。你感到胃里一阵恶心，但随后……这些感觉突然消失了。{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « Soyez {mf|maudit|maudite}, {name} ! Je vous hais, je vous hais ! » {n}La fureur mêlée de terreur de Cassia vous brûle les poumons. Vos genoux semblent se dérober tandis que dans votre esprit règne la confusion la plus totale. Vous vous sentez {mf|nauséeux|nauséeuse}, presque au bord des larmes, quand soudain... tout s'apaise.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Damn you, {name}! I hate you, I hate you!" {n}Cassia's fear and rage burn your lungs. Your knees buckle, tears swell in your throat, and your head is in utter disarray. You feel nauseous, but then... the sensations suddenly ease.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Soyez {mf|maudit|maudite}, {name} ! Je vous hais, je vous hais ! » {n}La fureur mêlée de terreur de Cassia vous brûle les poumons. Vos genoux semblent se dérober tandis que dans votre esprit règne la confusion la plus totale. Vous vous sentez {mf|nauséeux|nauséeuse}, presque au bord des larmes, quand soudain... tout s'apaise.{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: «¡Maldit{mf|o|a} seas, {name}! ¡Te odio, te odio!». {n}El terror y la furia de Cassia hacen arder tus pulmones. Tus rodillas se doblan, las lágrimas te atenazan la garganta y tu cabeza es un torbellino. Sientes náuseas, pero después... las sensaciones se apaciguan de repente.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Damn you, {name}! I hate you, I hate you!" {n}Cassia's fear and rage burn your lungs. Your knees buckle, tears swell in your throat, and your head is in utter disarray. You feel nauseous, but then... the sensations suddenly ease.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «¡Maldit{mf|o|a} seas, {name}! ¡Te odio, te odio!». {n}El terror y la furia de Cassia hacen arder tus pulmones. Tus rodillas se doblan, las lágrimas te atenazan la garganta y tu cabeza es un torbellino. Sientes náuseas, pero después... las sensaciones se apaciguan de repente.{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Ich verfluche Euch, {name}! Ich hasse Euch, ich hasse Euch!" {n}Cassia Angst und Zorn verbrennen deine Lungen. Deine Knie werden weich, Tränen schießen dir in die Augen, in deinem Kopf herrscht Chaos. Dir wird schlecht, doch dann ... verschwinden all diese Empfindungen plötzlich.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Damn you, {name}! I hate you, I hate you!" {n}Cassia's fear and rage burn your lungs. Your knees buckle, tears swell in your throat, and your head is in utter disarray. You feel nauseous, but then... the sensations suddenly ease.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ich verfluche Euch, {name}! Ich hasse Euch, ich hasse Euch!" {n}Cassia Angst und Zorn verbrennen deine Lungen. Deine Knie werden weich, Tränen schießen dir in die Augen, in deinem Kopf herrscht Chaos. Dir wird schlecht, doch dann ... verschwinden all diese Empfindungen plötzlich.{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Sana lanet olsun {name}! Senden nefret ediyorum, nefret!" {n}Cassia'nın korkusu ve hiddeti, akciğerlerini yakıyor. Dizlerinin bağı çözülüyor, gözyaşlarına boğuluyor ve kafa karışıklığından şaşkına dönüyorsun. Miden bulanmaya başlıyor. Sonra da bir anda bu hisler geçiyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Damn you, {name}! I hate you, I hate you!" {n}Cassia's fear and rage burn your lungs. Your knees buckle, tears swell in your throat, and your head is in utter disarray. You feel nauseous, but then... the sensations suddenly ease.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Sana lanet olsun {name}! Senden nefret ediyorum, nefret!" {n}Cassia'nın korkusu ve hiddeti, akciğerlerini yakıyor. Dizlerin bükülüyor, gözyaşlarından boğazın şişiyor ve kafa karışıklığından şaşkına dönüyorsun. Miden bulanmaya başlıyor. Sonra da bu hisler bir anda geçiyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion
